articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens
The new @gitcoinpassport API is simple to use - just a REST call w API Key
The new docs are beautiful & easy to understand 💅
I've also created and open-sourced a project using @gitcoinpassport @nextjs & Rainbow KIT showing how to easily gate any app 🔐

Gitcoin Passport — Sybil Defense. Made Simple.: 🚨 BIG ANNOUNCEMENT 📣
After months of hard work, we’re THRILLED to announce the launch of the @GitcoinPassport Scorer API, which makes it 10x easier than before to “Passport-gate” your web3 project.
Read further to learn how to use this new API 🧵
